verses.verse: The word <WH1697> which came to Jeremiah <WH3414> from Yahweh, <WH3068> when Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and all his army, <WH2428> and all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776> that were under his dominion, <WH3027> and all the peoples, <WH5971> were fighting <WH3898> against Jerusalem, <WH3389> and against all the cities <WH5892> of it, <WH559> saying:

and you shall not escape out <WH4422> of his hand, <WH3027> but shall surely <WH8610> be taken, <WH8610> and delivered <WH5414> into his hand; <WH3027> and your eyes <WH5869> shall see <WH7200> the eyes <WH5869> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and he shall speak <WH1696> with you mouth <WH6310> to mouth, <WH6310> and you shall go <WH935> to Babylon. <WH894>

Yet hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh, <WH3068> O Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah: <WH3063> thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> concerning you, <WH4191> You shall not die by the sword; <WH2719>

you shall die <WH4191> in peace; <WH7965> and with the burnings <WH4955> of your fathers, <WH1> the former <WH7223> kings <WH4428> who were before <WH6440> you, <WH8313> so shall they make a burning for you; <WH5594> and they shall lament you, <WH1945> saying, Ah Lord! <WH113> for I have spoken <WH1696> the word, <WH1697> says <WH5002> Yahweh. <WH3068>
Then Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> spoke <WH1696> all these words <WH1697> to Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> in Jerusalem, <WH3389>

when the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>'s army <WH2428> was fighting <WH3898> against Jerusalem, <WH3389> and against all the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> that were left, <WH3498> against Lachish <WH3923> and against Azekah; <WH5825> for these alone remained <WH7604> of the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> as fortified <WH4013> cities. <WH5892>

The word <WH1697> that came to Jeremiah <WH3414> from Yahweh, <WH3068> after <WH310> that the king <WH4428> Zedekiah <WH6667> had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with all the people <WH5971> who were at Jerusalem, <WH3389> to proclaim <WH7121> liberty to them; <WH1865>

that every man <WH376> should let his male <WH5650> servant, <WH376> and every man his female <WH8198> servant, <WH5680> who is a Hebrew or a Hebrewess, <WH5680> go <WH7971> free; <WH2670> that none should make bondservants <WH5647> of them, <WH3064> of a Jew his brother. <WH251>

All the princes <WH8269> and all the people <WH5971> obeyed, <WH935> who had entered into the covenant, <WH1285> that everyone <WH376> should let his male <WH5650> servant, <WH376> and everyone his female <WH8198> servant, <WH7971> go free, <WH2670> that none should make bondservants <WH5647> of them any more; <WH8085> they obeyed, and let them go: <WH7971>

but afterwards <WH310> they turned, <WH7725> and caused the servants <WH5650> and the handmaids, <WH8198> whom they had let go <WH7971> free, <WH2670> to return, <WH7725> and brought them into subjection <WH3533> for servants <WH5650> and for handmaids. <WH8198>
Therefore the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to Jeremiah <WH3414> from Yahweh, <WH3068> saying, <WH559>

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel: <WH3478> I made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with your fathers <WH1> in the day <WH3117> that I brought them forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> out of the house <WH1004> of bondage, <WH5650> saying, <WH559>

At the end <WH7093> of seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> you shall let go <WH7971> every man <WH376> his brother <WH251> who is a Hebrew, <WH5680> who has been sold <WH4376> to you, <WH5647> and has served you six <WH8337> years, <WH8141> you shall let him go <WH7971> free <WH2670> from you: <WH1> but your fathers didn't <WH8085> listen to me, <WH5186> neither inclined their ear. <WH241>

You had now <WH3117> turned, <WH7725> and had done <WH6213> that which is right <WH3477> in my eyes, <WH5869> in proclaiming <WH7121> liberty <WH1865> every man <WH376> to his neighbor; <WH7453> and you had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> me in the house <WH1004> which is called <WH7121> by my name: <WH8034>

but you turned <WH7725> and profaned <WH2490> my name, <WH8034> and caused every man <WH376> his servant, <WH5650> and every man <WH376> his handmaid, <WH8198> whom you had let <WH7971> go free <WH2670> at their pleasure, <WH5315> to return; <WH7725> and you brought them into subjection, <WH3533> to be to you for servants <WH5650> and for handmaids. <WH8198>

Therefore thus says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> you have not listened <WH8085> to me, <WH7121> to proclaim liberty, <WH1865> every man <WH376> to his brother, <WH251> and every man <WH376> to his neighbor: <WH7453> behold, <WH7121> I proclaim to you a liberty, <WH1865> says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> to the sword, <WH2719> to the pestilence, <WH1698> and to the famine; <WH7458> and I will make <WH5414> you to be tossed <WH2189> back and forth among all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth. <WH776>

I will give <WH5414> the men <WH582> who have transgressed <WH5674> my covenant, <WH1285> who have not performed <WH6965> the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285> which they made <WH3772> before <WH6440> me, <WH3772> when they cut the calf <WH5695> in two <WH8147> and passed <WH5674> between its parts; <WH1335>

the princes <WH8269> of Judah, <WH3063> and the princes <WH8269> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> the eunuchs, <WH5631> and the priests, <WH3548> and all the people <WH5971> of the land, <WH776> who passed <WH5674> between the parts <WH1335> of the calf; <WH5695>

I will even give <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies, <WH341> and into the hand <WH3027> of those who seek <WH1245> their life; <WH5315> and their dead bodies <WH5038> shall be for food <WH3978> to the birds <WH5775> of the sky, <WH8064> and to the animals <WH929> of the earth. <WH776>

Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> and his princes <WH8269> will I give <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies, <WH341> and into the hand <WH3027> of those who seek <WH1245> their life, <WH5315> and into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>'s army, <WH2428> who have gone away from you. <WH5927>

Behold, <WH6680> I will command, says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> and cause them to return <WH7725> to this city; <WH5892> and they shall fight <WH3898> against it, <WH3920> and take it, <WH8313> and burn it with fire: <WH784> and I will make <WH5414> the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> a desolation, <WH8077> without inhabitant. <WH3427>
